import React from "react"; import * as ReactBootStrap from "react-bootstrap"; import Personal from './images/checkbook2.jpg'; const Personalchecking=() =>{ //Creating personal checking account console.log("Test", localStorage.getItem("JWTToken")); handleChange = event =>{ this.setState({ [event.target.name]:event.target.value }) } handleSubmit = event =>{ event.preventDefault(); console.log('balance: ' + this.state.balance) const url ="http://localhost:9090/Me/PersonalCheckingAccounts" const data= { balance: this.StaticRange.balance } } fetch(url, { "method": "POST", "headers": { "content-type": "application/json", "Authorization" : `Bearer ${ localStorage.getItem("JWTToken")}` }, "body": JSON.stringify(data), }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(response => { }); const year = new Date().getFullYear(); return(
